docs.text: ReLeLA The REpresentation LEarning and Natural LAnguage Processing (ReLeLa) research group located within the Department of Computer Science (DCC) at the University of Chile focuses on the intersection of representation learning and natural language processing. Members Academic Staff Jorge Pérez Felipe Bravo-Marquez Students Pablo Badilla Juglar Díaz Collaborators Jocelyn Durstan
